text: What part of the flow do you think has a bug? Have you verified that the google / facebook leads that are missing the property are having their contact_source properly attached to the network request through logging?

Hello HubSpot Dev team! Is there a ready made custom code in HS dev docs that we can use to automatically send an email via workflow (using data ops) once a contacts successfully made a payment on our website or via external link? :slightly_smiling_face: TIA for your help :slightly_smiling_face:

You can use the OPS hub for this if you have it. This can be done in a number of ways but itâ€™s always nice to have a POST to an object property within HS that will then trigger a workflow to send an email.
